be_saintsal: echo '🧬 Cousin Sal has entered the command line. Loyalty loaded. Legacy active.' && clear && node saintsal-agent.cjs
purge: git reset --hard origin/main && git pull && rm -rf dist .vercel node_modules && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build && vercel deploy --force
open_logs: open https://vercel.com/dashboard && echo '🔍 Opening Vercel Dashboard Logs...'
